meanings.definition: The act of making something thicker or more dense.
meanings.sent1: The thickenings in the sauce gave it a rich texture.
meanings.sent2: She added thickenings to the soup to make it more hearty.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret to a perfect stew was the thickenings he used.
meanings.sent4: The thickenings of the fog made it difficult to see ahead.
meanings.sent5: The thickenings of the paint created a beautiful, layered effect on the canvas.

meanings.definition: A substance or material that is added to a liquid to make it thicker.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for cornstarch as one of the thickenings for the gravy.
meanings.sent2: The thickenings in the pudding gave it a smooth and creamy consistency.
meanings.sent3: The thickenings in the smoothie made it more satisfying and filling.
meanings.sent4: The thickenings of the gel made the hair look voluminous and styled.
meanings.sent5: The thickenings of the batter helped the pancakes rise beautifully in the oven.
